sentence.text: More important, Col5a2 haploinsufficiency markedly increased the incidence and severity of abdominal aortic aneurysms, and caused aortic tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation ruptures and dissections, indicating that Î±2(V) chain deficits may play roles in these pathologies in humans

entity.text: tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation
